languages.text: "Ребята мои следят, чтобы работяги по две миски за раз не съедали. И одной хватает живот набить на вахту вперед. Конечно, некоторые на вкус жалуются... неблагодарные".
languages.translation_comment: слизнеплесень — съедобная склизская субстанция, покрывающая стены ныжних туннелей
слизнеплесень — съедобная склизская субстанция, покрывающая стены ныжних туннелей

languages.text: "My people keep an eye out for workers trying to eat two bowls in one sitting. One is enough to fill your stomach for an entire watch. Some complain about the taste, of course... Ingrates."
languages.original_text: "Ребята мои следят, чтобы работяги по две миски за раз не съедали. И одной хватает живот набить на вахту вперед. Конечно, некоторые на вкус жалуются... неблагодарные".

traits.locale_text: "My people keep an eye out for workers trying to eat two bowls in one sitting. One is enough to fill your stomach for an entire watch. Some complain about the taste, of course... Ingrates."

"My people keep an eye out for workers trying to eat two bowls in one sitting. One is enough to fill your stomach for an entire watch. Some complain about the taste, of course... Ingrates."
"My people keep an eye out for workers trying to eat two bowls in one sitting. One is enough to fill your stomach for an entire watch. Some complain about the taste, of course... Ingrates."

languages.text: «Mi gente vigila para que nadie intente comerse dos boles de una sentada. Uno solo llena el estómago durante toda una guardia. Hay quien se queja del sabor, naturalmente... Desagradecidos...».
languages.original_text: "My people keep an eye out for workers trying to eat two bowls in one sitting. One is enough to fill your stomach for an entire watch. Some complain about the taste, of course... Ingrates."

traits.locale_text: «Mi gente vigila para que nadie intente comerse dos boles de una sentada. Uno solo llena el estómago durante toda una guardia. Hay quien se queja del sabor, naturalmente... Desagradecidos...».

languages.text: 「部下たちは、1度に2杯分食べようとする労働者に気を付けているんです。1杯あれば1ウォッチ分は腹が満たされる。もちろん、味に文句を言うものもいるが…恩知らずどもが」
languages.original_text: "My people keep an eye out for workers trying to eat two bowls in one sitting. One is enough to fill your stomach for an entire watch. Some complain about the taste, of course... Ingrates."

traits.locale_text: 「部下たちは、1度に2杯分食べようとする労働者に気を付けているんです。1杯あれば1ウォッチ分は腹が満たされる。もちろん、味に文句を言うものもいるが…恩知らずどもが」

languages.text: “我的人会留意那些打算一次吃两碗的工人。这玩意儿只要吃上一碗，就足够顶一整巡了。有些人还会抱怨汤难喝，可不是嘛……那群忘恩负义的家伙。”
languages.original_text: "My people keep an eye out for workers trying to eat two bowls in one sitting. One is enough to fill your stomach for an entire watch. Some complain about the taste, of course... Ingrates."

traits.locale_text: “我的人会留意那些打算一次吃两碗的工人。这玩意儿只要吃上一碗，就足够顶一整巡了。有些人还会抱怨汤难喝，可不是嘛……那群忘恩负义的家伙。”

languages.text: "Meine Leute achten darauf, dass kein Arbeiter zwei Schüsseln auf einmal isst. Eine füllt den Magen für eine ganze Wachschicht. Natürlich beschweren sich einige über den Geschmack ... undankbare Banausen."
languages.original_text: "My people keep an eye out for workers trying to eat two bowls in one sitting. One is enough to fill your stomach for an entire watch. Some complain about the taste, of course... Ingrates."

traits.locale_text: "Meine Leute achten darauf, dass kein Arbeiter zwei Schüsseln auf einmal isst. Eine füllt den Magen für eine ganze Wachschicht. Natürlich beschweren sich einige über den Geschmack ... undankbare Banausen."

languages.text: « Mes gars veillent au grain pour qu'aucun ouvrier s'enfile deux bols d'un coup. Une portion suffit normalement à tenir tout un quart. Alors, bien sûr, y en a qui se plaignent du goût, mais bon... Y a toujours des ingrats. »
languages.original_text: "My people keep an eye out for workers trying to eat two bowls in one sitting. One is enough to fill your stomach for an entire watch. Some complain about the taste, of course... Ingrates."

traits.locale_text: « Mes gars veillent au grain pour qu'aucun ouvrier s'enfile deux bols d'un coup. Une portion suffit normalement à tenir tout un quart. Alors, bien sûr, y en a qui se plaignent du goût, mais bon... Y a toujours des ingrats. »

languages.text: "Emrimdekiler, bir oturuşta iki kâse yemeye çalışan işçilere karşı gözlerini dört açıyor. Bir kâse, tüm nöbet için karnını doyurmaya yetiyor. Bazıları tadından şikâyet ediyor elbette ama... Nankörler işte."
languages.original_text: "My people keep an eye out for workers trying to eat two bowls in one sitting. One is enough to fill your stomach for an entire watch. Some complain about the taste, of course... Ingrates."
